required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Establishment of the Breast Milk Database in China
clinical_study.official_title: Establishment of the Breast Milk Database in China

brief_summary.textblock: Collect breast milk samples in various administrative regions of China to measure the nutrients in breast milk; analyze the composition of nutrients; and establish the database of breast milk in China.

detailed_description.textblock:
The study cities are Guangzhou, Weihai, Chengdu, Beijing, Harbin, Wuhan, Jinhua, Zhengzhou and Lanzhou.
Breast milk will be collected at 9:00-11:00 in the morning from 15 to180 days after giving birth. The nutrients (protein, triglyceride, phospholipid, oligosaccharides and probiotics) in the collected breast milk samples will be measured. These data will be used to establish the breast milk database in China. This databased will provide references for infant nutrient intake and for the formulation and revision of infant formula standards. It will also provide references for the development of new infant formula products in China.

primary_outcome.description: Protein in breast milk measured in percent (%)

secondary_outcome.description: Fatty acids composition (mg/L) in breast milk
Amino acids composition (mg/L) in breast milk
Probiotics composition (species) measured using gene sequencing in breast milk;
Investigation on the dietary composition of participating mothers obtained using questionnaire
Body weight measurement (kg) of participating mothers
Age (years) of participating mothers obtained using questionnaire
Educational level of participating mothers obtained using questionnaire
Occupation of participating mothers obtained using questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Physical health condition of participating mothers
secondary_outcome.description: Physical health condition of participating mothers assessed by questionnaire

biospec_descr.textblock: A minimum of 60ml of breast milk will be collected for each subject.

study_pop.textblock: Healthy lactating mother of 25 ~ 35 years old who are currently breast-feeding infants of 15 ~180 days old. Subjects are equally distributed in the postpartum time period of 15~35 days, 36~65 days, 66~95 days, 96~125 days, 126~55 days and 156~185 days
